rows.label: tlk43400542_02_msg0002
rows.name:
If a Core Crystal remains intact,
you can bond with it again.

rows.label: tlk43400542_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Apparently, the Blade loses its
memories, but looks exactly the same.

rows.label: tlk43400542_02_msg0004
rows.name: But you can't do it straight away.

rows.label: tlk43400542_02_msg0005
rows.name:
You have to wait until the crystal's
returned to its normal color.
